mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.sale_product_name AS saleProductName, a.sale_product_describe AS saleProductDescribe, a.sale_product_price AS saleProductPrice, a.sale_product_picture AS saleProductPicture FROM sale_product a LEFT JOIN collect_sale b ON a.id=b.sale_product_id LEFT JOIN user c ON c.id=b.user_id WHERE c.id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM collect_sale WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND sale_product_id=#{productId}
